headline: Why Quanta Services (PWR) Is Up 7.9% After Record Grid Backlog And New Energy Transition Deals
summary: In recent days, Quanta Services reported record backlog levels and secured additional North American transmission and distribution contracts tied to grid modernization and energy transition projects. The company’s segment reorganization around electric infrastructure, together with upward analyst estimate revisions, highlights how its operations are increasingly aligned with long-term utility and renewable investment needs. Against this backdrop, we’ll examine how Quanta’s new contracts...

headline: Quanta Services (PWR) Valuation Check After New Grid Contracts And Record Backlog Fuel Investor Interest
summary: Quanta Services (PWR) is back in focus after securing new transmission and distribution contracts that align with its energy transition work, record backlog, and recent market outperformance ahead of its upcoming earnings release. See our latest analysis for Quanta Services. The latest contract wins come on top of a strong run, with a 1-day share price return of 4.27%, a 30-day share price return of 9.40%, and a 1-year total shareholder return of 38.47%. This suggests momentum has been...

headline: What You Need To Know Ahead of Quanta Services' Earnings Release
summary: While Quanta Services is set to report its fourth-quarter earnings soon, analysts are anticipating a single-digit increase in its bottom line.
